# overlay

**Type Property**

A possible value of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/DefinitionOptionKey/presentationType] dictionary key that produces a small overlay window at the string location,

## Declaration

```swift
static let overlay: NSView.DefinitionPresentationType
```

## Presentation Values

- **dictionaryApplication**: A possible value of the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/DefinitionOptionKey/presentationType] dictionary key that invokes Dictionary application to display the definition.
